name: Starcaster
detailed_description:
Starcaster is a challenging arcade style side-scroller coming to Steam early 2018. Defeat enemies, level up, and unlock new spells. Traverse through ten worlds and survive deadly enemies and challenging terrain. Acquire upgrades after each run to go farther in subsequent tries. Even with full upgrades, completing all ten worlds in one run is no easy task!

Play by yourself or play with up to four friends locally or online to reach scores higher than you ever could alone.



Features:
  • Completely original art and music
  • Over fifty enemies
  • Randomly generated terrain and enemies
  • Ten worlds and fifty levels
  • Eight spells
  • Many permanent character and spell upgrades
  • Personal stats and highscores
